0.name: Apple Tree 🌳
0.description: A deciduous tree known for producing apples. Grows in temperate climates with vibrant spring blossoms 🌸 and fruits in late summer to fall 🍂.

1.name: Blueberry Bush 🌿
1.description: A shrub that bears clusters of blueberries. Blossoms in spring 🌸 and fruits in early to mid-summer ☀️.

2.name: Cherry Tree 🌸
2.description: A flowering tree that produces cherries. Known for stunning spring blossoms 🌸 and fruits in late spring to early summer ☀️.

3.name: Corn Plant 🌽
3.description: A tall annual grass grown in summer ☀️. Planted in late spring 🌱 and harvested in late summer to early fall 🍂.

4.name: Grape Vine 🍇
4.description: A climbing plant that fruits in late summer to early fall 🍇🍂. Requires full sun ☀️ and grows actively through spring and summer 🌱☀️.

5.name: Peach Tree 🍑
5.description: A deciduous tree blooming in early spring 🌸 and producing fruit in summer ☀️.

6.name: Pepper Plant 🌶️
6.description: A warm-weather plant. Planted in late spring 🌱 and harvested in summer to early fall ☀️🍂.

7.name: Soybean Plant 🌱
7.description: Planted in late spring 🌱 and harvested in late summer to early fall 🍂.

8.name: Strawberry Plant 🍓
8.description: Blooms in spring 🌸 and bears fruit in late spring to early summer ☀️.

9.name: Tomato Plant 🍅
9.description: A sun-loving plant. Planted in spring 🌱 and harvested in summer ☀️.
